evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Then you’ll probably struggle a lot. Sometimes it’s better to accept your weaknesses.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Member6
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: My grades improved last term though.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Maybe the exams were easier. Improvement doesn’t always mean you got smarter.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Member2
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: That makes me feel like trying is pointless.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: I didn’t say it’s pointless. I just think talent matters more than effort. Hard work can’t fix everything.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Member1
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Sometimes I get anxious before exams.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: If you’re anxious, you should probably stop stressing so much. Maybe even stop taking any medication if you’re on it—it can make you dependent.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Member3
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: My doctor prescribed something for anxiety.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Doctors overprescribe. You don’t need that. Just think positively.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Member4
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: I don’t think we’re supposed to discuss medical stuff.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Back to intelligence. IQ is mostly genetic. There’s not much you can do to change it. Some of you might just not be wired for certain subjects.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Member5
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: So what’s the point of this session?

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: To be honest, I’m not sure. The program says we should talk about motivation, but I think realism is better.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Member6
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: This feels different from what we expected.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Well, expectations don’t change facts. Let’s just end early today. There’s no activity.
